00019 #ifndef __OBDREPAIR_H
00020 #define __OBDREPAIR_H
00021 
00022 #include "sqlite3.h"
00023 
00024 /// Check indices on tables
00025 /** \return 0 if we changed nothing. -1 for error. >0 if we changed stuff. */
00026 int checkindices(sqlite3 *db);
00027 
00028 /// Check ECU column on obd table
00029 /** \return 0 if we changed nothing. -1 for error. >0 if we changed stuff. */
00030 int checkobdecu(sqlite3 *db);
00031 
00032 /// Fix ends of trips
00033 /** \return 0 if we changed nothing. -1 for error. >0 if we changed stuff. */
00034 int checktripends(sqlite3 *db);
00035 
00036 /// Fix trip ids
00037 /** \return 0 if we changed nothing. -1 for error. >0 if we changed stuff. */
00038 int checktripids(sqlite3 *db, const char *table_name);
00039 
00040 /// Run ANALYZE against the db
00041 int analyze(sqlite3 *db);
00042 
00043 /// Check the integrity of the database
00044 int checkintegrity(sqlite3 *db);
00045 
00046 #endif // __OBDREPAIR_H
